resources.string: Swipe right to activate accessibility.
Swipe left to disable setting.
Camera is active now. Touch display to make a picture..
Guide for Settings.
To get to settings swipe from right to left anytime.
Guide for Camera Mode.
To scan text you must be in the camera mode. To get there you can swipe from left to right anytime.
Guide for Voice Control
To control the app with voice command you need to keep one finger on the display. While touching you will be listened to.
You are now in selection mode.
Touch upper half to get to gallery to choose picture.
By touching the half below you get to the camera mode to make a picture.
How do you want to select the picture?
Select from Gallery or Camera?
You are now in settings for accessibility.
Which accessibility setting do you want to modify?
Haptic feedback or Auditory Feedback or language
The haptic feedback is now enabled.
The haptic feedback is now disabled.
The auditory feedback is now enabled.
The auditory feedback is now disabled.
You are now in settings for design.
The current theme is Bright. Which theme do you want to select?
The current theme is Dark. Which theme do you want to select?
The current theme is contrast theme. Which theme do you want to select?
Dark Theme or contrast Theme
You are now in the general settings.
which settings would you like to change?
Design or accessibility or information
You are now at the information page of the app.
Which Information do you want to access?
Guide or Version
You are now in the language settings of the app
The current language is english. Which language do you want to set instead?
German or English
English was recognized as system language.
Swipe to the right to set system language as app language.
Swipe to the left to get to the language selection.
